name: Fusilli with Broccoli and Basil pesto and Red radish
description: Fusilli with Broccoli and Basil pesto is an easy and quick meat free meal, a great recipe after a long day at work
recipeIngredient: 5-6  florets of broccoli (chopped (a little more than 1 cup chopped))

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Fusilli or any similar pasta al-dente in salted water and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the Fusilli or any similar pasta al-dente in salted water and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pan, add oil and heat on medium. Add chopped garlic and chili and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium pan, add oil and heat on medium. Add chopped garlic and chili and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped broccoli and salt. Mix and cook for half a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped broccoli and salt. Mix and cook for half a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a quarter cup of water, cover and cook on low for 5-7 minutes until broccoli is a bit tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a quarter cup of water, cover and cook on low for 5-7 minutes until broccoli is a bit tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Take off heat. Cool a little and blend coarsely with the basil pesto and keep ready
recipeInstructions.name: Take off heat. Cool a little and blend coarsely with the basil pesto and keep ready

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan, add the chopped radishes and a few drops of oil, mix well to coat, and cook covered for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same pan, add the chopped radishes and a few drops of oil, mix well to coat, and cook covered for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the fusilli and coarse broccoli puree and mix to coat. Taste test and add more evoo, salt and chili flakes if needed. Cook on low for a minute so everything gets heated up well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the fusilli and coarse broccoli puree and mix to coat. Taste test and add more evoo, salt and chili flakes if needed. Cook on low for a minute so everything gets heated up well.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot. top with chopped or roasted cashew, walnut or almond slivers and nutritional yeast. optional.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot. top with chopped or roasted cashew, walnut or almond slivers and nutritional yeast. optional.

recipeInstructions.text: Alternatively, dont mix in the pasta and serve warm pasta topped with the coarse broccoli mix and lightly cooked radishes, salt and pepper.
